article: I have a good friend, his name is Jack Green. His parents often call him Jack. And he is an _ boy. He is from New York. He is thirteen. There are four _ in his family, father, mother, Jack and his _ . His father is an English teacher in China. He can only speak a little Chinese, so he goes to a Chinese class every Saturday. He says _ is very important in the world. Everyone in China learns it very hard. He says his students are very _ .His mother is a nurse, she _ very hard, too. Lucy is his sister. She and Jack are in the _ school. They like it very much. Jack like eating Chinese _ very much. He often eats dumplings near our school. He is _ at playing basketall, too. We often play it together.
